data.name: Don't Get Distracted
data.detailed_description:
Don't Get Distracted is a fast paced horror themed endurance test.

Just press and hold the buttons that pop up on the monitors, easy enough right?

The game throws lots of things at you to try to distract you:

-Paint covers your screen as you mess up, so you have to wipe it off


-The narrator telling you nonsense stories and jokes all while you try to keep focus and pay attention.

-Monitors turning off, forcing you to turn them back on


-Alarm clocks turning on, forcing you to turn them off


All while you get harassed by QTE's that are completely randomly generated, making it impossible to know what's next.

If you're pressing " / " at the 10 second mark in game it enables "Hard Mode" you will hear a spray paint can rattle once its activated

Things have to die before they can grow

data.short_description: Don't Get Distracted is a horror themed rage game. Just press and hold the buttons that pop up on the monitors, easy enough right?
data.reviews:
“I'd rather have aids than beat this again.”
9/10 – Mark

“You were making this instead of spending time with me??”
7/10 – Charlotte

“He has my family please help”
100/10 – ????

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: I think you need this to run a pc
  • Processor: Should 100% have one of those
  • Graphics: Also kind of need those!
  • Sound Card: I mean honestly having no sound might help out
